00020 #ifndef CO_OBJECTVERSION_H
00021 #define CO_OBJECTVERSION_H
00022 
00023 #include <co/api.h>
00024 #include <co/types.h>
00025 #include <lunchbox/bitOperation.h>
00026 #include <lunchbox/stdExt.h>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 
00029 namespace co
00030 {
00032 static const uint128_t VERSION_NONE( 0, 0 );
00033 static const uint128_t VERSION_FIRST( 0, 1 );
00034 static const uint128_t VERSION_NEWEST( 0, 0xfffffffffffffffbull );
00035 static const uint128_t VERSION_OLDEST( 0, 0xfffffffffffffffcull );
00036 static const uint128_t VERSION_NEXT( 0, 0xfffffffffffffffdull );
00037 static const uint128_t VERSION_INVALID( 0, 0xfffffffffffffffeull );
00038 static const uint128_t VERSION_HEAD( 0, 0xffffffffffffffffull );
00039 
00047 struct ObjectVersion
00048 {
00050     CO_API ObjectVersion();
00051 
00053     CO_API ObjectVersion( const uint128_t& identifier, const uint128_t& version );
00054 
00056     CO_API ObjectVersion( const Object* object );
00057 
00059     template< class R > ObjectVersion( lunchbox::RefPtr< R > object )
00060         { *this = object.get(); }
00061 
00063     CO_API ObjectVersion& operator = ( const Object* object );
00064 
00066     bool operator == ( const ObjectVersion& value ) const
00067         {
00068             return ( identifier == value.identifier &&
00069                      version == value.version );
00070         }
00071 
00073     bool operator != ( const ObjectVersion& value ) const
00074         {
00075             return ( identifier != value.identifier ||
00076                      version != value.version );
00077         }
00078 
00079     bool operator < ( const ObjectVersion& rhs ) const 
00080         {
00081             return identifier < rhs.identifier ||
00082                    ( identifier == rhs.identifier && version < rhs.version );
00083         }
00084 
00085     bool operator > ( const ObjectVersion& rhs ) const 
00086         {
00087             return identifier > rhs.identifier ||
00088                    ( identifier == rhs.identifier && version > rhs.version );
00089         }
00090 
00091     uint128_t identifier; 
00092     uint128_t version; 
00093 };
00094 
00095 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const ObjectVersion& ov)
00096 { return os << "id " << ov.identifier << " v" << ov.version; }
00097 }
00098 
00099 namespace lunchbox
00100 {
00101 template<> inline void byteswap( co::ObjectVersion& value ) 
00102 {
00103     lunchbox::byteswap( value.identifier );
00104     lunchbox::byteswap( value.version );
00105 }
00106 }
00107 
00108 LB_STDEXT_NAMESPACE_OPEN
00109 #ifdef LB_STDEXT_MSVC
00110 
00111 template<>
00112 inline size_t hash_compare< co::ObjectVersion >::operator()
00113     ( const co::ObjectVersion& key ) const
00114 {
00115     const size_t hashVersion = hash_value( key.version );
00116     const size_t hashID = hash_value( key.identifier );
00117 
00118     return hash_value( hashVersion ^ hashID );
00119 }
00120 #else
00121 
00122 template<> struct hash< co::ObjectVersion >
00123 {
00124     template< typename P > size_t operator()( const P& key ) const
00125         {
00126             return hash< uint64_t >()( hash_value( key.version ) ^
00127                                        hash_value( key.identifier ));
00128         }
00129 };
00130 #endif
